attributes.doc: Unit of measurement for data, which is fixed to 'watts'.
attributes.name: unit

datasets.doc: Applied power for optogenetic stimulus, in watts.
datasets.name: data

links.doc: Link to OptogeneticStimulusSite object that describes the site to which this stimulus was applied.
links.name: site

datasets.doc: Location of the stimulation site. Specify the area, layer, comments on estimation of area/layer, stereotaxic coordinates if in vivo, etc. Use standard atlas names for anatomical regions when possible.
datasets.name: location
